At Abenteuer, we take data protection seriously. We collect and process personal data in accordance with applicable data protection laws and regulations.

1. Collection of Information: We collect personal information, such as your name, email address, and phone number, to provide our services.

2. Use of Information: We use your personal information to communicate with you, provide customer support, and improve our services.

3. Disclosure of Information: We do not sell or share your personal information with third parties without your consent, except as required by law.

4. Security Measures: We implement security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

By using Abenteuer, you consent to the collection, processing, and use of your personal information as described in this Data Protection Policy. If you have any questions or concerns about our data protection practices, please contact us.
